bibl.title: Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume II
bibl.note: P. Corn. Inv. II, 38 recto (= S.B. VIII, 9907) is an offer made by a farmer to lease an orchard in the Hermopolite nome, dated September 19, A.D. 388. On the verso (published here) private accounts provide information on expenses expressed in quantities of knidia of wine.
LITINAS Nikos, P. Corn. inv. II 38, Back.

Jaakko FRÖSÉN, Tiina PUROLA and Erja SALMENKIVI (Edd.), Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume II = Commentationes Humanarum Litterarum. 122, 2, 2007 (Helsinki, 2007) pp. 559-567 et pl. coul. XXIII.
